entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Repo build crashing with DOTNET_HeapVerify=1 #112613
  • Thread.SetThreadPoolWorkerThreadName takes way too many CPU cycles #112608

Closed

  • System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs is broken on .NET Framework #111749
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]:Inject to GC #112601
  • Build of cross native components is not incremental #11852
  • runtest.py doesn't use stress modes on R2R crossgen'ed framework assemblies #12363
  • Wrong size used for vectorization check in BitArray #111558
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • SPMI: Ensure proper zero extension for `isObjectImmutable` and friends #112617
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid `Unsafe.As` in `BitConvertor` #112616
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Unify struct arg morphing #112612
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use `WriteDoubleLittleEndian` in `NumericGraphemeInfo` #112611
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Start marking GVM as virtual #112610
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update DbDataSource.cs #112609
    area-System.Data, community-contribution

Merged

  • Remove incompatible API from PKCS netstandard2.0 lib #112591
    area-System.Security, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 10.0.0
  • Avoid `Unsafe.As` in `RangeCharSearchValues` #112606
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fixed the issue of incorrect return value of PalVirtualAlloc #112579
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix size used for vectorization check in BitArray (#111558) #111564
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Fix build of windows arm64 crossdac #112553
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono][interp] Fix execution of delegate invoke wrapper with interpreter #111700
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 9.0.3
  • Implement ExportPkcs12 #112569
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Experiment] Clone blocks with bounds checks #112595
  • Implement ProcessStartInfo.InheritHandles for Windows #107836
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • When generating Theory, wrap execution into try/catch #112031
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand `Span<T>` capture #112543
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix winarm64 crossdac build #112594
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Optimize Min/Max paths with AVX10.2 intrinsics #112535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
